name: Brain Hotel
description:
Based on the Comic: Tales of the Odd, Ed Arnold has the misfortune of delivering a package to the Brain Hotel on the eve of their annual super-villain convention and stumbles across a sinister plot that threatens the lives of countless hotel patrons!  FEATURES
  • Classic Point & Click interface.
  • Comic Book inspired graphics.
  • Fully vocalized by talented actors.
  • Flash based MAAGE engine.
